notes: Second generation compact SUV. Timing belt engines require regular replacement. Standard SUV service requirements. Data sourced from Wikipedia Kia Sportage article, January 2025 revision.
First generation body-on-frame SUV. Timing belt engines require regular replacement. Available with part-time 4WD system. Data sourced from Wikipedia Kia Sorento article, January 2025 revision.
Second generation minivan. Timing belt engine requires regular replacement. Standard FWD minivan service requirements. Data sourced from Wikipedia Kia Carnival article, January 2025 revision.
First generation minivan. Timing belt engine requires regular replacement. Standard FWD minivan service requirements. Data sourced from Wikipedia Kia Carnival article, January 2025 revision.
Second generation midsize sedan. Timing belt engines require regular replacement. Basic FWD service requirements. Data sourced from Wikipedia Kia Optima article, January 2025 revision.
First generation midsize sedan. Replaced Kia Magentis branding in North America. Timing belt engines. Data sourced from Wikipedia Kia Optima article, January 2025 revision.
Second generation compact sedan. Timing belt engine requires regular replacement. Basic FWD service requirements. Data sourced from Wikipedia Kia Spectra article, January 2025 revision.

First generation compact sedan replacing Sephia. Timing belt engine requires regular replacement. Basic FWD service requirements. Data sourced from Wikipedia Kia Spectra article, January 2025 revision.
Second generation subcompact. Timing belt engine requires regular replacement. Basic FWD service requirements. Data sourced from Wikipedia Kia Rio article, January 2025 revision.
First generation subcompact. Timing belt engine requires regular replacement. Basic FWD service requirements. Data sourced from Wikipedia Kia Rio article, January 2025 revision.
Second generation compact sedan. Replaced by Spectra in 2000. Timing belt engine. Basic FWD service requirements. Data sourced from Wikipedia Kia Sephia article, January 2025 revision.
Full-size luxury sedan. Timing belt engines require regular replacement. RWD configuration. Data sourced from Wikipedia Kia Amanti article, January 2025 revision.
